item.title: End US-18 on US-18/US-20 West at I-25
item.description: End US-18 on US-18/US-20 West at I-25 - Orin Junction.

item.title: US-18/US-20 East Approaching I-25/US-26/US-87
item.description: US-18/US-20 East approaching I-25/US-26/US-87 at Orin Junction. US-20 west joins I-25/US-87 North/US-26 West to Glenrock. US-18 ends here.

item.title: US-20 West/US-18 West at WY-270
item.description: US-20 West/US-18 West at WY-270. Use WY-270 north to Lance Creek and Manville. Use WY-270 south to Guernsey.

item.title: US-18 West/US-20 West at WY-273
item.description: US-18 West/US-20 West at WY-273 in Lusk.

item.title: US-18 West/US-20 West/US-85 South at US-18/US-20 Junction
item.description: US-18 West/US-20 West/US-85 South at US-18/US-20 junction in Lusk. Turn right for US-18 West/US-20 West to Douglas. Continue south on US-85 for Torrington.

item.title: US-20 West at US-18/US-85 - Lusk
item.description: US-20 West at US-18/US-85 in Lusk. Use US-18 East/US-85 North to Newcastle. Use US-20 West/US-18-West/US-85 South to Douglas (via US-18/US-20) and Torrington (via US-85).

item.title: US-20 West Approaching US-18/US-85
item.description: US-20 West approaching US-18/US-85 in Lusk.

item.title: US-18 East/US-59 South At US-18/US-59 Split
item.description: US-18 East/US-59 South At US-18/US-59 split in O’Brien County. Use US-59 south to Primghar; use US-18 east to Hartley.

item.title: US-18 East/US-59 South Approaching US-18/US-59 Split
item.description: US-18 East/US-59 South approaching US-18/US-59 split in O’Brien County.

item.title: US-18 East at SD-89
item.description: US-18 East at SD-89 in Fall River County.

item.title: US-18 East at SD-89 North
item.description: US-18 East at SD-89 North to Custer. Continue east on US-18 for Hot Springs.

item.title: US-18 East Approaching SD-89 North
item.description: US-18 East approaching SD-89 North in Fall River County.

item.title: US-18 East - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on US-18 east. Distance to SD-89, and Hot Springs.

item.title: US-18 East at SD-471 South
item.description: US-18 East at SD-471 South in Edgemont.

item.title: US-18 East Approaching SD-471
item.description: US-18 East approaching SD-471 south to Edgemont and Provo. Continue east on US-18 for Hot Springs.

item.title: US-18 East Approaching SD-471
item.description: US-18 East approaching SD-471 in Edgemont.

item.title: US-18 East - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on US-18 east. Distance to Edgemont and Hot Springs. This is the first distance marker on US-18 in South Dakota.

item.title: US-18 East - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on US-18 east. Distance to State Line (South Dakota) and Edgemont SD.

item.title: US-18 East/US-85 North - Mule Creek Junction
item.description: US-18 East/US-85 North at Mule Creek Junction. Turn right for US-18 East to Edgemont, SD. Continue north on US-85 for Newcastle.

item.title: US-85 North/US-18 East - Niobrara County
item.description: US-85 North/US-18 East in Niobrara County

item.title: US-18 East/US-85 North at WY-270
item.description: US-18 East/US-85 North at WY-270 south to Lance Creek.

item.title: US-85 North/US-18 East Approaching WY-270
item.description: US-85 North/US-18 East approaching WY-270. WY-270 is closed when lights flashing.

item.title: US-18 East/US-85 North - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance Marker on US-18 East/US-85 North. Distance to Mule Creek Junction and Newcastle.

item.title: US-18/US-20 East/US-85 North at US-20
item.description: US-18/US-20 East/US-85 North at US-20 East in Lusk. Continue on US-85 North/US-18 East for Newcastle; turn right for US-20 east to Chadron (Nebraska).

item.title: US-18/US-20 East at US-85
item.description: US-18/US-20 East at US-85 in Lusk. Use US-85 south to Torrington; US-85 North/US-20/US-18 East to Chadron, Nebraska (via US-20) and Newcastle (via US-85 North). US-85 joins US-20/US-18 East through Lusk.

item.title: US-18/US-20 East Approaching US-85
item.description: US-18/US-20 East approaching US-85 in Lusk.

item.title: US-18/US-20 West - Lusk
item.description: Entering Lusk on US-18/US-20 West. Lusk is the county seat of Niobrara County.

item.title: US-18/US-20 East - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance Marker on US-18/US-20 East. Distance to Lusk and Van Tassell (via US-20).

item.title: WY-270 North at US-18/US-20
item.description: WY-270 North at US-18/US-20 in Manville. Use US-18/US-20 East to Lusk; US-18/US-20 West to Douglas (via I-25).

item.title: WY-270 North Approaching US-18/US-20
item.description: WY-270 North Approaching US-18/US-20 in Manville.

item.title: WY-270 North Approaching WY-318
item.description: WY-270 North approaching WY-318 in Hartville. Turn left to continue north on WY-318 to US-18/US-20.

item.title: I-25 South - Exit 126
item.description: I-25 south at Exit 126 - US-18/US-20 East/Lusk. This is the western end of US-18. US-20 leaves I-25 southbound here.

item.title: I-25 South - Exit 126
item.description: I-25 south approaching Exit 126 - US-20/US-18/Lusk. This is the beginning of US-18. US-20 leaves I-25 here and heads east into Nebraska.

item.title: End WY-319 at US-18/US-20
item.description: US-18/US-20 Shields at End of WY-319

item.title: I-25 Exit 126 Offramp at US-20/US-18
item.description: US-20/US-18 at I-25 to Lusk

item.title: US-20/US-18 West at I-25
item.description: I-25 Freeway Entrance on US-20 West

item.title: WY-270 South at US-20/US-18
item.description: WY-270 South at US-20/US-18 in Manville.
